suggested_yarn: Hedgehog Fibres Oh So Fine Cashmere
full_text: Lightweight and delicate short sleeve pattern with a sporty feel. One piece, top down construction, designed to fit loosely for an easy to wear layering top. Yarn: Hedgehog Fibres Oh So Fine Cashmere (30% Cashmere, 70% Merino, 600m/100g). 1 skein of the recommended yarn is required for sizes XS and S; 2 skeins are required for all other sizes M-5XL. The yardage calculations are approximate. Final amounts in g: 82 (94, 104, 120, 133, 145, 159, 171, 180). Lin is 5’2’’ and she’s wearing size S. The second version is pictured in my own handspun using a Lucky Dip Fibre pack by Hedgehog Fibres. I spun a light fingering 2ply. I’m 5’4’’ and I’m wearing size M.
name: Ravelry: Blooming Breeze Tee pattern by Beata Jezek
